biotools.summary: The fastLSAsoftware package expands the boundaries of LSA allowing analysis on datasets with millions of co-varying time series. Mapping metadata onto force-directed graphs derived from FAST LSA allows investigators to view correlated cliques and explore previously unrecognized network relationships.

bioschemas.name: fastLSA
